Tap Pikachu to give Snorlax
some Berries!

HomeSceneTutorialController_Text_31: You can’t use this feature yet.
HomeSceneTutorialController_Text_32: Try tapping Pikachu or its Berries!
HomeSceneTutorialController_CannotUse_Le:
You’ll be able to use this feature once
you’ve completed the Dex goal of
registering 7 sleep styles.
HomeSceneTutorialController_CannotUse_Co:
You’ll be able to use this feature once
you’ve completed the Dex goal of
registering 12 sleep styles.
HomeSceneTutorialController_CannotUse_Po:
You’ll be able to use this feature once
you’ve completed the Dex goal of
registering 35 sleep styles.
HomeSceneTutorialController_NewSnorlaxPo:

the event area, where you’ll meet a
